name: Nuclear Football
description:
My first game!

Control the famed Nuclear Football to:

  1. Destroy endless waves of enemies
  2. Survive an onslaught of bullets, missiles, monsters, and even the weather
  3. Achieve the highest score possible!

To succeed, you'll have to:

  1. Use the laser cannon - fire faster over time, but watch out for overheating!
  2. Evade and escape a wide variety of enemy behaviors and projectiles
  3. Use tools to withstand heat-seeking missiles and turbulence

Many thanks to the GamDev.TV team for the instruction and to all the wonderful artists out there who made their assets available to tinkerers like me. Thank you guys for making the hobby possible and for encouraging a thriving community.

All artists are credited in-game

I recommend playing the tutorial, but if you want a faster start, disable the tutorial via the options menu.

Enjoy!
